website_summaries.verdict: Give your skin the boost of hydration it's been craving with this gentle sheet mask.
pros: Individually wrapped sheet masks come in a pack of 12
Brings life and moisture back to dry, flaky skin
Calming and gentle on all skin types
Leave masks in the fridge for a cool refresher on a hot day
cons: You can't move around much with this sheet on your face, it may fall off

customer_reviews.title: recommended by my dermatologist
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome face masks! They hydrate but are not greasy! My dermatologist uses them herself!!
customer_reviews.author: Parkerspal

customer_reviews.title: Better then regular sheet masks
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturizing! I like the feeling of the material on my skin. I put it overnight and remove in the middle of the night. Overall great result!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Gushchina

customer_reviews.title: Talk about 10 years younger!
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I use one of these masks, my skin looks hydrated, smooth and it’s soft! These are worth the money and it’s better to buy in bulk on Amazon! It’s a great way to end a crazy work week!!
customer_reviews.author: ❤️🍷

customer_reviews.title: During California winter, my face is definitely not dry.
customer_reviews.text: Hydrates my skin, I use it 2 or 3 times a week. Almost finished a box already. Just a tad bit hard to get the actual mask out of the plastic pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Icee

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: Great basic mask. Feels great on your skin and leaves your skin feeling silky smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Treece

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: Dry? Flaky? Constantly trying to achieve that gorgeous, hydrated glow? Look no further. Use this miracle sheets 1-2 times a week and say hello to flawlessly moisturized, glowing, gorgeous skin. You'll wonder where they've been all of your life. Seriously, stop reading this review already and add them to your cart.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Best sheet mask I have tried
customer_reviews.text: Bought these since my skin gets dry and I have trouble finding a good moisturizer that I like. Bought once from a retail store and then looked for them online. They are very fairly priced here relative to Target and do a great job, leaving my skin feeling refreshed. I'm packing them to take along on my business trip next week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product great. Delivery suspicious
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great and the price is very good. However product arrived damaged and the packaging looks like it had been opened and then taped back together. The package arrived late as well so not sure if someone opened it, saw what it was and taped it back together
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Hydration Galore
customer_reviews.text: No need to waste your $ on expensive products. Try this refreshing mask. Very Hydration. Contain Hydrolonic Acid, let it sit on your face until it dries if you have time. Be sure to follow up with their serum. I keep mine in the frig very refreshing
customer_reviews.author: Uwfotogal

customer_reviews.title: Take a hard pass, unless you have no nose.
customer_reviews.text: Serum is too water, mask not made for people with high bridges, hard to peel apart and apply. Take a pass. Good price but is it really with not great product? Too much inner packaging.
customer_reviews.author: zaav

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and have struggled with acne for many years. I use these masks about three times a week, after cleansing my face. I leave the mask on for one hour and then apply the hydro boost serum and gel based moisturizer. My dermatologist even mentioned how she thought my skin was “glowing”. I would highly recommend as these masks are non comedogenic and do not seem to irritate sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with hydration on my face and these masks are amazing! Easy to use and make my face feeling brand new. My only tedious complaint is that they are pretty big...but I've got a pinhead so I'm not the best example haha
customer_reviews.author: Creacrea

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product line, and love the masks! Easy to apply, hydrating and leaves skin smooth after. You don't need to rise off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite skin products!
customer_reviews.text: These masks are amazing. I keep them in the fridge for a cooling effect on my skin. I use them about once a week to infuse moisture, especially in the winter months. LOVE having the 12 pack. Very convenient and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Candeegal

customer_reviews.title: Keeps falling off face
customer_reviews.text: I only use Neutrogena products, was disappointed that the mask would not stay on my face. Had to send back. Gave it 3 stars because for the amount of time it did stay on 4 mins it made my face feel clean
customer_reviews.author: beauti4ash

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite thing
customer_reviews.text: I love these face masks so much that I do them weekly! Sometimes I leave them on for an hour at a time. A quick tip though: it can be kind of a drippy mess, but I’ve gotten around that by pouring the excess product into my hand and massaging it on my body before I even pull the mask out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Make my skin feel uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: After using this product, my skin will be itchy and show a rash. I will ask for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: JChen

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: I really like them! I tried many different paper masks and this one was the winner for me. Makes my face skin feel so fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mahsa

customer_reviews.title: Works like it says!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! My face is so soft and hydrated when I use the mask! It’s a bit messy but totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Best mask I've used!
customer_reviews.text: ok, so this mask may be a bit challenging to put on, but its literally the best mask that is out there. It moisturizes my face and my face feels amazing and is glowing after each use.
customer_reviews.author: nicole light

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mask!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mask! I have sensitive skin and this mask is so hydrating.
customer_reviews.author: Michi

customer_reviews.title: Best face Mask!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a variety of masks and these are by far one of the best ones I’ve had! Easy to use, amazing scent, and great results! My skin feels amazing after every use!
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Rose

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. I use it after using a bentonite clay mask for hydration and I follow up with aloe vera gel and their overnight hydro boost. Best thing I've ever done. I do this at least as once a week and I'm seen a huge difference in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Price

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!! 🥰❤️🙌🏼
customer_reviews.text: Perfect 2 piece hydro gel masks, easy to place on face and visible results after 15-20mins of application 🙌🏼❤️
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great hydrating masks
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hydrating masks. Cheap as heck and work great. Fitting the mask on the face can take some finagling but it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M. Sowder

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the way that my skin feels after using the mask. It feels hydrated and appears brighter. Will be purchasing again. These is a lot of liquid in the package so be sure to stand the package up when opening it to ensure the liquid does not fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but tough to use
customer_reviews.text: The two separate pieces are unnecessary and really difficult to use. Should be a single sheet. Otherwise good product.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mask leave smile n feel young supple healthy
customer_reviews.text: This mask will leave your skin so supple. I use all the hydro boost line.im addicted to the line and mask.
customer_reviews.author: Vfran.

customer_reviews.title: Glowy
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my go to face masks. I have dry skin and use this mask every other day. My mom asks how my skin is so glowy this is the reason. 12 masks for less than $30 is totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bijal

customer_reviews.title: 100 percent effective!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very concentrated. Saw a huge difference after 1day of use. The very best.
customer_reviews.author: Eyrich jill

customer_reviews.title: Best hydrating face mask on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Best hydrating face mask for sensitive skin. It is my go to mask and amazing for all skin types.
customer_reviews.author: ftager

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizing mask, been using this for 2 years now. Highly recommend!!!! I have super sensitive skin and it gets irritated easily, but this mask does wonders for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: lily

customer_reviews.title: These gel masks are my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Not only do they have soothing serum, but they stay cool for almost 30 minutes, making it an incredibly relaxing experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey D Chassen

customer_reviews.title: It was a little difficult to use the first time, you need to take your time when applying.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a good facial; my skin felt great after using it!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly from Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing results! Was very pleased with how my skin felt moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Botic

customer_reviews.title: Great weekly mask
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these face masks!!! Leaves my skin smooth and supple
customer_reviews.author: Kenya

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because the moisturizer i was using by neutrogena, which looks almost exactly like these masks, wasnt hydrating my face at all.. i wore one of these for 15 minutes and my face started flaking even more! Luckily i found a good noncomedogenic moisturizer by a different company im throwing these away..
customer_reviews.author: randapanda

customer_reviews.title: Decent mask
customer_reviews.text: The mask does leave my skin feeling softer and I love the scent, but I have used better masks. I don't feel it is as hydrating as some other brands. I also don't like that it comes in two pieces. It sometimes slides off of my face. However, if money is a concern this is a decent product and it is a great value for 12 masks.
customer_reviews.author: Rock Princess

customer_reviews.title: Are not staying on face correctly not hydrating correctly
customer_reviews.text: These do not work as well as was expected I’ve had this product before but these ones must be old or something.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Wallace

customer_reviews.title: I like it BUT ...
customer_reviews.text: The mask falls off and is a bit worksy to apply. I don't like that it is in 2 pieces. It does moisturize my skin leaving it feeling soft. I won't purchase it again due to how hard it was to keep it in place!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! I have very dry skin and these overnight packs really add moisture. I got 3 uses out of one pod, put the opened pod in a sandwich bag and it got a little thick but worked the same by next use. Used far apart, like couple weeks apart. Also use the face mask that I love as well. Good value too. 1 pod is 2.00 at the drugstore.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Branche

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: These masks have hyaluronic acid in them and you can visibly see, almost instantly, the fullness and softness on your face when you remove the mask. When you get over a certain age and you find something that’s good/works , stick with it Plus it is a major brand so I expected nothing less than what it promised to deliver
customer_reviews.author: Angie OPV

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I thought this item came in a pack, i love this item but it’s definitely cheaper in store. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL!
customer_reviews.text: These masks are the greatest! They have a lot of moisture on/in them so you definitely need to put it on and relax. If you're looking for a mask to stick so hard you can do chores in them, these aren't for you. These are insanely relaxing. I give them to my friends and family quite often.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Teel

customer_reviews.title: my favorite weekly routine
customer_reviews.text: Used for 20-30 minutes makes my skin feel sso moisturized! It's a little pricey to use daily considering all the other skin products (Obagi, mostly) that I use but right after exfoliating, weekly, this one is super.
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Schroer

customer_reviews.title: Very Hydrating
customer_reviews.text: I use these masks before I go to bed, they are wonderful make they my skin soft and very hydrated. Will continue to purchase and use as my nightly regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Joselle

customer_reviews.title: Love these masks
customer_reviews.text: They feel so amazing. Instant cooling effect. I plan to refrigerate my next mask to make it even better. It leaves my skin glowing and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Great mask!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I have been using then.on my son, he has severe eczema and it works wonders. Only issue I have is that I could get them at Nordstrom Rack for a lot less. But their stock isnt always consistent.
customer_reviews.author: EA77

customer_reviews.title: Product works better than other face mask
customer_reviews.text: Used product a couple times, and I can totally see a difference the next morning. Really hydrating, and seems to work better than the paper masks.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey S.

customer_reviews.title: So refreshing and can really see a difference
customer_reviews.text: Okay I’ve read some reviews that said it was too messy - it’s a collagen face mask - it’s gonna be a little messy
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask. Feels so good after u take it off. & makes my skin look & feel great. Very inexpensive 4 royal he results
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Would not repurchase because they are in two pieces and hard to keep bottom half in place. Would like if they were one piece!
customer_reviews.author: Pam H

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask.
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask. Ultra moisturizing. Fine line smoothing. Favorite mask.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Mazeika

customer_reviews.title: Best face mask ever
customer_reviews.text: This is favorite face mask. Please sell it again. The price point was good.
customer_reviews.author: s7

product_meta.title: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Moisturizing & Hydrating 100% Hydrogel Sheet Mask, Face Mask for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid, Gentle & Non-Comedogenic, 1 oz (Pack of 12)
product_meta.description: Deeply moisturize your face with the Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hydrating 100% Hydrogel Face Mask for dry skin. This innovative hydrogel mask instantly quenches dry skin, leaving it hydrated, smooth, and supple. Made from a unique 100% hydrogel material, there is nourishing serum in each face mask. The skin-nourishing formula contains purified hyaluronic acid. Once applied, the face mask contours to your skin and seals in its hydrating formula for optimal absorption to deliver clinically proven results. To use, apply the face mask after cleansing and before applying serum and leave on for 15 to 30 minutes to give your skin an extra boost of hydration. Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hydrating 100% Hydrogel Mask is gentle to skin and non-comedogenic, so it won't clog pores. The Hydro Boost Collection includes hydrating Hand Cream, Body Gel Cream, Facial Moisturizers and Cleansers for a full hydrating at-home skincare routine
feature_bullets: 1-count of 1 0 ounce Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hydrating 100% Hydrogel Face Sheet Mask for dry skin with purified hyaluronic acid to quench skin and help maintain skin's essential moisture
Sheet mask leaves dry skin deeply moisturized and smooth with its unique hydrating 100% hydrogel material which holds up to 50% more essence than a standard paper face mask
The moisturizing hydrogel sheet mask is formulated with hyaluronic acid, a compound found naturally in skin and leaves skin feeling smooth and supple

This moisturizing sheet mask is recommended as part of a regular at-home skin care routine by applying to skin after cleansing and before applying facial serum, leaving on skin for 15 to 30 minutes for an extra boost of hydration

From a dermatologist-recommended skin care brand, this hydrating sheet mask sheet is gentle & non-comedogenic The Hydro Boost Collection includes Hand Cream, Body Gel Cream, Moisturizers and Cleansers for a full hydrating at-home skincare routine

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
